title: Can't play a League game
body: I recently have moved and don't access to my original monitor, so in place of it I'm using a fairly large tv. The thing about the tv is that the resolution is pretty bad. All settings(tv and computer) didn't fully fit and look well. It's been a week since I've played so it could just be a new bug, but the actual issue is that when I start a game it goes black screen, flickers, has no signal, closes, then brings up a DirectX error something about my drivers needing updates(yes they are updated). I need my League fix, anyone have an idea?       {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}

replies.body: It sounds like the tv might be a 4K or exceeding 1920x1080 which isn't currently supported.  You may need to try scaling down the monitor and in-game resolution or try another screen.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well so our tech team can look into this directly with you and find some other options.

The issue was resolved by retrieving my usual monitor. This tv is quite old didn't have many options and my pc is in need of a new graphics driver. Luckily, the problem has been resolved and thank you for your concern.
